[[Image:MPlayer.png|thumb|300px|[[MPlayer]] is an example of a cross-platform Media Player]]
'''Media player''' is a term typically used to describe [[computer software]] for playing back [[multimedia]] [[computer file|file]]s. Most software media players support an array of media formats, including both [[digital audio|audio]] and [[digital video|video]] files.
'''Media player''' is a term typically used to describe [[computer software]] for playing back [[multimedia]] [[computer file|file]]s. Most software media players support an array of media formats, including both [[digital audio|audio]] and [[digital video|video]] files.
